message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling this amazing product to you. I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. This is my best offer, and it reflects the value I see in it for my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to offer the product to you for $11,500. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the value the product brings to your business.
